citations.narrative:
The licensee notified the inspector that all regulated species have been moved to a new address. The licensee did not
notify USDA of the location change. Accurate information regarding the license is important for ensuring the facility meets
the regulations and standards and inspections can be conducted. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90
days of any changes in the name, address, substantial control or ownership, locations, activities, and number or types of
animals. The licensee needs to notify Animal Care before any future changes are made regarding the license.
To be corrected by April 5, 2023 and from this day forward.
The exit interview was conducted with the licensee.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED FROM THIS NEW ADDRESS UNTIL A NEW SITE INSPECTION
IS PASSED.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee notified the inspector that all regulated species have been moved to a new address.  The licensee did not 
notify USDA of the location change. Accurate information regarding the license is important for ensuring the facility meets 
the regulations and standards and  inspections can be conducted. A licensee shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 
days of any changes in the name, address, substantial control or ownership, locations, activities, and number or types of 
animals. The licensee needs to notify Animal Care before any future changes are made regarding the license. 
 
To be corrected by April 5, 2023 and from this day forward. 
 
The exit interview was conducted with the licensee. 
 
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES MAY BE CONDUCTED FROM THIS NEW ADDRESS UNTIL A NEW SITE INSPECTION 
IS PASSED. 
 
 n
